@graph.name: Example Sepsis Schema (2 Hospitals, Binary Outcome)
@graph.description: Schema definition for population-level metrics with sepsis outcome and distinct hospital/sepsis populations.

sepsis.description: Whether the patient has sepsis (binary outcome)

Age_years.description: Age of the patient in years (can be fractional for <1 year)
